Team Description: The VMware Investment Strategy Team is a small and focused group that advises our CEO, CFO, and executive leaders on evaluating, assessing, and prioritizing investments for the company across its entire portfolio of products including vSphere, NSX, AirWatch, vSan, and more. The team has a proven record of identifying market and competitive trends early, embedding these trends into planning conversations and driving downstream change throughout the company.  The teams mission is to help VMW identify and invest in the right opportunities, with deliberate thought and a relentless focus on prioritization, ROI and economic value.  We seek to accomplish this mission through: Activities that impact today, such as annual strategy planning, long-range planning, prioritization and optimization of existing portfolio investmentsActivities that impact tomorrow, such as providing informed counsel on business strategy and business model evaluation, including core research teams, M&A;, and partnerships. Our team will embed you into the center of a dynamic company (>20k employees, >$35B market cap), transition to a cloud-centric future, with a responsibility for informing and recommending the investment strategies we should execute.
